channel.title: Machine Learning on Zuzanna Deutschman
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Zuzanna Deutschman

item.title: Recommender Systems: Machine Learning Metrics and Business Metrics
item.description: This article was written for neptune.ai. It is about what metrics to select for recommender systems evaluation, so the Business strategies and Machine Learning models can work in harmony.

item.title: Predict The Office character with TwoModalBERT
item.description: Introduction Have you ever dealt with a case when there were multiple text features in your dataset? For example, your task could be to properly classify a message given its context, understood as the previous message. Let’s consider whether we want to classify the below sample as positive or negative. context message This product is horrible, which I didn’t expect. Its website is just incredible! When only the message is considered, you can see its sentiment is positive due to the word ‘incredible’.

item.title: Sentiment Analyzer with BERT (build, tune, deploy)
item.description: This article was published in Towards Data Science. It is a blog post presenting how to develop a sentiment analyzer. It covers text preprocessing, model building, tuning, API, frontend creation, and containerization.

item.title: Generate Nick Caveâ€™s Lyrics in 2 mins
item.description: This article was published in Towards Data Science. It is a blog post presenting a simple song lyrics generator using GPT-2 language model.

item.title: Replicate your friend with Transformer
item.description: This article was written for Chatbot’s Life. It is a tutorial in which a chatbot based on a conversation from Messenger is created from scratch using TensorFlow.

item.title: Multi-Label Text Classification
item.description: This article was published in Towards Data Science. It is a blog post presenting various methods of multi-label multiclass classification techniques.
